attributes.additional_details: Smart Motorways are a massive danger to innocent motorists abd people are getting injured and killed because of them.
attributes.background: Smart Motorways are dangerous and people are dying and getting injured .Ban them now before many more innocent motorists are injured or worse.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Moratorium and review of "Smart Motorways" and associated works
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549295
